title: Enhancing Organizational Development Practical Competencies: Interactive Social Connection Building in Online Mathematics Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic arithmetic operations and problem-solving skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners share opinions on mathematical problem-solving processes at least twice weekly on the LMS discussion board
Learners revise and supplement mathematical explanation materials based on peer feedback during group activities
Learners achieve a social connectedness index score of 3.5 or higher (5-point scale) in online surveys
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
